name: v6.1.1 Release
body: - Make Xcode debugging work on iOS 14 by patching an Apple bug that caused it to break after rebooting userspace

name: v6.1.0 Release
body:
- Fix all known stability and reliability problems on iOS 14
- Fix a bug that caused the unc0ver app to show different jailbreak settings when opened in the jailbroken state on iOS 14
- Add custom libkrw plugin to enable kernel read-write support on iOS 14 for security researchers and developers

name: v6.0.2 Release
body: - Additional fixes for stability and reliability problems on iOS 14

name: v6.0.1 Release
body:
- Fix loading launch scripts on iOS 14
- Fix disable tweaks switch
- Fix stability and reliability problems on iOS 14
- Fix some jailbreak apps crashing on launch on iOS 14

name: v5.3.1 Release
body: - Fix support for removing leftover files from RootLessJB

name: v5.3.0 Release
body:
- Add iOS 12.3-12.3.1 and 12.4.1-12.4.8 (Latest versions) support for iPhone 5S, iPhone 6 and iPad Air 1 models with high exploit reliability
- Fix rare reliability issues within the jailbreak process for all devices

name: v5.2.1 Release
body:
- Fix bugs in the device compatibility manager
- Fix a logic bug to improve performance
- Fix patchfinder initialization for A7-A8 devices
- Allow jailbreaking with corrupted /tmp directory

name: v5.2.0 Release
body:
- Enable iOS 13.5.5~b1 support
- Fix a logic bug in disabling auto updates
- Update bundled Cydia to fix crashes on iOS 13.5 with Hardware Keyboard enabled

name: v5.0.1 Release
body:
- Full-fledged support for all devices on iOS 11.0-13.5 with Cydia and tweak injection
- Enable unrestricted storage access to jailbreak applications for sandbox backwards compatibility while keeping security intact by leaving the security restrictions enabled for system and user applications
- Update Phone Rebel case models and bundled packages

Note: System must be rebooted to apply changes when updating the unc0ver jailbreak

name: v5.0.0 Release
body: - Full-fledged support for all devices on iOS 11.0-13.5 with Cydia and tweak injection
